meanings.definition: A scientist who studies ancient animals.
meanings.sent1: The paleozoologists discovered a fossil of a dinosaur.
meanings.sent2: Many paleozoologists work in museums to learn about prehistoric creatures.
meanings.sent3: The paleozoologists joked that they were like detectives investigating ancient mysteries.
meanings.sent4: In the world of paleozoologists, fossils are like time capsules waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The paleozoologists' passion for ancient animals is truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: Learning about paleozoologists helps us understand the history of life on Earth.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a course on paleozoologists for students interested in ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: During the lecture on paleozoologists, the students were amazed by the diversity of ancient life forms.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the world of paleozoologists is like stepping back in time to walk among dinosaurs.
meanings.sent5: The book on paleozoologists is filled with fascinating facts about ancient animals.
